nodes.name: toggleGroupStatus

devdoc.author: Harsh Rajat
devdoc.details: This Contract forms File Storage / Stamping / Encryption part of Hydro Protocols

createGroup(string).details: Create a new Group for the user

params._groupName: describes the name of the group

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renameGroup(uint16,string).details: Rename an existing Group for the user / ein

params._groupIndex: describes the associated index of the group for the user / ein
params._groupName: describes the new name of the group

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

toggleGroupStatus(uint16,bool).details: Toggle an existing Group status (Activate | Deactivate) for the user / ein

params._groupIndex: describes the associated index of the group for the user / ein
params._status: describes the status of the group

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

devdoc.title: Ice Protocol

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

userdoc.notice: Create Protocol Less File Storage, Grouping, Hassle free Encryption / Decryption and Stamping using Snowflake
